citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the records of acquisition and disposition did not accurately reflect the animals at the facility.
The facility did not have the acquisition records and dates for the caracal, 2 serval, 2 bobcats and a lynx. The facility also
did not have disposition dates for the jaguarundi and 2 cougar who have passed away. This information needs to be
maintained in a timely and accurate manner for record keeping purposes.
Correct by: April 25, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of the inspection, the records of acquisition and disposition did not accurately reflect the animals at the facility. 
The facility did not have the acquisition records and dates for the caracal, 2 serval, 2 bobcats and a lynx. The facility also 
did not have disposition dates for the jaguarundi and 2 cougar who have passed away. This information needs to be 
maintained in a timely and accurate manner for record keeping purposes.  
 
Correct by: April 25, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
